GSP30vatnsupu:1: 1ab: saṃghaṭṭaghaṭṭanabaloditanirvikāra- śūnyātiśūnyapadam avyayabodhasāram 1cd: sarvatra khecaradṛśā pravirājate yat tan naumi sāhasavaraṃ guruvaktragamyam
GSP30vatnsupu:4: 3ab: śrīmadvātūlanāthasya hṛdayāmbhodhisaṃbhavam 3cd: pūjyapūjakapūjābhiḥ projjhitaṃ yan namāmi tat 4ab: yeneha sarvavṛttīnāṃ madhyasaṃstho 'pi sarvadā
GSP30vatnsupu:6: 5ab: tam apūrvam anāveśam asparśam aniketanam 5cd: saṃvidvikalpasaṃkalpa- ghaṭṭanaṃ naumy
GSP30vatnsupu:8: 6cd: kenāpi kriyate samyak- paratattvopabṛṃhitā iha kila ṣaḍdarśanacaturāmnāyādimelāpaparyantasamastadarśanottīrṇam akathyam api śrīmadvātūlanāthasya pīṭheśvaryocchuṣmapādaugham uktvā tad anu paramarahasyopabṛṃhitatrayodaśakathāsākātkāradṛśā
GSP30vatnsupu:9: kramākramāstināstitathyātathyabhedābhedasavikalpanirvikalpabhavanirvāṇakalaṅkojjhitaṃ kim apy anavakāśaṃ paraṃ tattvaṃ sūtramukhenādiśanti yatredam ādisūtram
GSP30vatnsupu:11: atitīvrātitīvrataraviśṛṅkhalaśaktipātāghrātasya svasvarūpasamāviṣṭasya kasya cit kva cit kadā cid akasmād eva "*mahāsāhasavṛttyā*"
GSP30vatnsupu:15: jhaṭiti sarvollaṅghanakrameṇāniketasvarūpaprāptisākṣātkāramahāsāhasacarcāsaṃpradāyaṃ nirūpya, idānīṃ tatraiva sarvavṛttimahāsāmarasyam ekakāle pracakṣate
GSP30vatnsupu:19: tat tena prāguktamahāsāhasadaśāsamāveśakramaprāpyeṇa svarūpalābhena kālākālakalpanottīrṇālaṃgrāsavapuṣā mahānirīheṇācchuritā spṛṣtā svasvarūpatāṃ nītāḷ"*pravṛttir*" prakarṣeṇa vartamānā vṛttir satatam acyutatayā tatsamāveśāvasthānam ity arthaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:20: ity anayoktibhaṅgyā sarvavṛttīnāṃ samanantaram eva sarvottīrṇamahāśūnyatādhāmni dhāmarūpe tanmayatayā parasparavibhedavigalanenodayapadavyām eva satatam avasthitir sthitetyarthaḥ ityanayoktibhaṅgyā tulyakālakathanopadeśam uktvedānīṃ pustakakathāṃ nirūpayanti
GSP30vatnsupu:22: śrīmanniṣkriyānandanāthānugrahasamaye śrīgandhamādanasiddhapādair akṛtakapustakapradarśanena yā parapade prāptir upadiṣṭā saiva vitatya nirūpyate /
GSP30vatnsupu:26: tasya valayadvayaṃ jāgratsvapnātmakam unmudrya granthinibandhanam apahṛtya
GSP30vatnsupu:33: itthaṃ mahānayoktadṛśā sarvaśāstraprapañcottīrṇātvād avācyaṃ kim api mahopadeśasākṣātkāram ubhayapaṭṭakākārasadasadrūpadvayanivāraṇena nistaraṅgaparavyomasamāveśavivarjitam āsūtritamahāśūnyatāsamāveśam āvedya,
GSP30vatnsupu:45: ākāśaṃ caitad yugmāntarasthaṃ satsuṣiratayā sarvapranāḍikāntaroditaṃ ca bahudhā vibhaktam
GSP30vatnsupu:46: pṛthivyādivāyvantaṃ bhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ bhogyarūpam ākāśaṃ ca bhoktṛsvabhāvam iti vā /
GSP30vatnsupu:48: bhoktā sadaiva tiṣṭhati; bhoktary api bhogaḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:50: evamuktayuktyā pratyekaṃ pṛthivyādimahābhūtapañcakaṃ yugmena dvayavibhūtyānārataṃ prollasatītyabhiprāyaḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:51: athavā pratyekaṃ vyaktāvyaktatayā bahirantaratayā śāntodriktatayā vā vibhāti /
GSP30vatnsupu:53: ``niravakāśasaṃvinniṣṭhā'' niravakāśā yeyaṃ saṃvit tasyā niṣṭhā samyagaviparyastatayā saṃthitiḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:54: niravakāśasaṃvittvena nāpi savikalpasaṃvidunmeṣair avakāśo labhyate, nāpi nirvikalpasaṃvitsvabhāvena praveśo 'dhigamyate /
GSP30vatnsupu:55: ittham aprameyatvān niruttaraparamādvayasvabhāvatvāc ca niravakāśasaṃvid ihocyate /
GSP30vatnsupu:56: tasyā niṣṭhā varagurupradarśitadṛśā satatam ucyatā gatir keṣāṃcid bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:58: dvayavigalanena paratattvāvasthitiṃ yugmacarcāgamanikayehoktvā, tad anu saṃghaṭṭakathāsākṣātkāro nirūpyate
GSP30vatnsupu:60: siddhā ca yoginyaś ca tā siddhayoginyo viṣayakaraṇeśvarīrūpā /
GSP30vatnsupu:63: mahāmelāpasyāhaṃtedaṃtātmakadvayavigalanān niruttaracidvyomni satataṃ mahāsāmarasyātmakasya sarvatra pratyakṣatayodayaḥ samullāso bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:65: ubhayavigalanena sadaiva mahāmelāpodayam uktvā, tad anu kañcukatrayollaṅghanena niruttarapadaprāptiṃ
GSP30vatnsupu:68: tatra bhāvikaṃ śabdādyahaṃkāraparyantaṃ tanmātrarūpaṃ, bhautikaṃ pṛthivyādirūpaṃ, śūnyaṃ nirīhākhyaṃ vāsanāsvarūpaṃ ca /
GSP30vatnsupu:73: ucyate, bhautikaṃ jāgratprathā sthitir nigadyate, śūnyaṃ suṣuptadaśā saṃhāro 'bhidhīyate
GSP30vatnsupu:75: sannyāsāt ``nirākhyapadāvasthitir''nirgatākhyābhidhānaṃ yasyāsau nirākhyo 'vyapadeśyam anuttaraṃ vāguttīrṇaṃ paraṃ dhāma, tasmin sarvottīrṇāniketanaparamākāśe 'vasthitir sadaivāparicyutasvabhāvaniṣṭhā bhavatīti saṃbandhaḥ //6//
GSP30vatnsupu:76: itthaṃ kañcukatrayollaṅghanena turyapadaprāptiṃ nirūpya, idānīṃ sarvavākprathāsu nirāvaraṇāsu svarabhūtivijṛmbhaiva prathate sadaiva, iti nirūpayanti
GSP30vatnsupu:80: saiva cānāhatanādasvarūpatām avāptā nirvibhāgadharmiṇī samastavarṇodayaṃ vaṭadhānikāvad antodhārayantī draṣṭṛsvabhāvā paśyantīti vyapadeśyā /
GSP30vatnsupu:81: saiva ca saṃkalpavikalpanivahaniścayātmabuddhibhūmiṃ svīkṛtavatī varṇapuñjaṃ śimbikāphalanyāyenāntodhārayantī madhyametyabhihitā /
GSP30vatnsupu:82: saiva hṛtkaṇṭhatālvādisthānakaraṇakrameṇāhatā satī varṇavibhavamayaślokādivad bhedarūpaṃ prakaṭayantī rūpādisamastaviśvaprathāṃ ca vyaktatām āpādayantī vaikharīty uktā /
GSP30vatnsupu:83: itthaṃ niravakāśāt saṃvitpadāt vākcatuṣṭayam aviratam anirodhatayā prathate /
GSP30vatnsupu:84: evam īdṛksvabhāvavākcatuṣṭayasyodayaś ca virāmaś ca tāvad udayavirāmau
GSP30vatnsupu:85: sṛṣṭisaṃhārau, tayor prathā vyaktāvyaktatayā sadaivāviratam ullasantyaḥ sphurantyaḥ, tāsu ``svaraḥ'' anāhatahatottīrṇamahānādollāsavikāsasvabhāvaḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:86: ``prathate'' savikalpanirvikalpasaṃviduttīrṇaparaviyadudayam eva prakāśitaṃ satatam akaraṇapravṛttyā prayātīty arthaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:87: itthaṃ nānābhedollāsaprakāśarūpeṣu varṇanivahodvahodayeṣu madhyāt prativarṇāntare vākcatuṣṭayakrameṇākhaṇḍitavṛttyā svasvarūpam aparityajya yathāmukhopadiṣṭanītyā svaraiva prathate, ityuktaṃ bhavati //7//
GSP30vatnsupu:88: iti vākcatuṣṭayodayakrameṇa nirāvaraṇasvarodayaḥ sarvatra sarvakālaṃ sphurati, iti nirūpya, idānīṃ rasatritayābhoge sati paraṃ dhāmaiva niruttaraṃ cakāsti, iti nigadyate
GSP30vatnsupu:92: virahitabhedaprathātmakasaṃsārāvagrahaṃ śāntacitrobhayavidhabrahmasvarūpasamuttīrṇaṃ kim api niruttaraprakṛṣṭatarāmarśasaṃvitsvabhāvaṃ "*paraṃ brahma*" eva satatam anastamitasthityā vijṛmbhatety arthaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:95: payidharas tu payaḥ samastāpyāyakatvāt sarvāśrayasaṃvitsvarūpaṃ tad eva dhārayati sthitipraroham avalambayati yaḥ spando 'dyonmeṣaiva
GSP30vatnsupu:98: etattrayodhūtaṃ rasarūpaṃ tattadanubhavacamatkārasāmarasyam āsvādya svātmany akṛtakakhamudrānupraveśād vimṛśya, turyasvabhāvo mahāsaṃhārākhyo 'navarataṃ paramādvayatayā vibhātīti rahasyārthaḥ evaṃ niravakāśabhaṅgyā rasatritayacarcāsaṃpradāyaṃ nirūpya, idānīṃ devīcatuṣṭayakathāsākṣātkāraḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:101: tatra ca sarvagrāsaniratatvāt kṣud eva mahāsaṃhāraḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:107: sarvakālaṃ pratyekaṃ cāturātmyenodyogābhāsacarvaṇālaṃgrāsavapuṣā svasvarūpāvasthitir pañcamapadātiśāyinī niravakāśasaṃvinniṣṭhā sthitety arthaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:108: ity anena sūtreṇa devīcatuṣṭayakathākramaṃ prakāśya, idānīṃ dvādaśavāhacakrarahasyaṃ nirūpyate
GSP30vatnsupu:110: manaḥsaṃhitaṃ śrotrādibuddhīndriyapañcakaṃ, tathā buddhisaṃhitaṃ vāgādikarmendriyapañcakaṃ, etadubhayasamūhaḥ "*dvādaśavāhaḥ*" /
GSP30vatnsupu:114: mahāsaṃvidraśmīnāṃ "*vikāsaḥ*" niyatāniyatacidacitprathāvigalanena nityavikasvarasvabhāvo mahāprabodhaḥ satatam avinaśvaratayā sarvatra
GSP30vatnsupu:116: ity akaraṇasiddhaṃ sadaiva nirāvaraṇapadasamāveśaṃ dvādaśavāhodayadṛśā prakāśya, idānīṃ caryāpañcakasaṃpradāyaṃ nirūpyanti
GSP30vatnsupu:125: unmattā ca vicittavatsvatantratayā grāhyāgrāhyasaṃbandhāvivakṣayā svaviṣayagrahaṇāya prathitā
GSP30vatnsupu:127: sarvavyāpikā ca tvagvṛttigamanikayā nikhilavyāpakatvād aśeṣasparśasvīkaraṇāyonmiṣitā; iti caryāpañcakodayaḥ //
GSP30vatnsupu:132: akaraṇakrameṇa yathāsthitasaṃniveśena tyāgasvīkāraparihārataḥ satatam acyutavṛttyā tadrūpeṇa sphuraṇam /
GSP30vatnsupu:136: vīravarasyāpaścimajanmanaḥ kasya cit sarvakālam akṛtakānubhavarasacarvaṇasaṃtṛptasya bhavabhūmāv eva bandhamokṣobhayottīrṇamahāmuktir karatalāmalakavat sthitety arthaḥ //
GSP30vatnsupu:143: tatra hatas tāvat kathyate hṛtkaṇṭhatālvādisthānakaraṇasaṃniveśair hato
GSP30vatnsupu:152: tathā cānāhatahatottīrṇo yaḥ sa śṛṅgāṭakākāro raudrīsvabhāvas turyaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:154: anāhataś ca bāhurūpāmbikāśaktir yāgame nirūpitā tatsvarūpaḥ svapnaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:158: tatraivam akathanaṃ vākprapañcottīrṇam akathanam eva kathanaṃ saṃkramaṇakrameṇa nirniketasvarūpāvadhānaṃ tad eva balaṃ akṛtakasphārasāraṃ /
GSP30vatnsupu:159: tena saṃkramaṇaṃ ca manāg iha vitanyate /
GSP30vatnsupu:160: prāṇapuryaṣṭakaśūnyapramātṛniviniṣṭābhimānavigalanena nistaraṅgapravikacacciddhāmabaddhāspado daiśikavaro niḥspandānandasundaraparamaśūnyadṛgbalena kāryakaraṇakarmanirapekṣatayā yad yat kiṃ cit sarvagatātmasvarūpapratipattāv avalokayati tat tat parataracinmayam eva satataṃ bhavati, iti nāsty atra sandehaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:161: tathā cānyad vyākhyāntaram āha kathanaṃ tāvat ṣaḍdarśanacaturāmnāyamelāpakramasamūheṣu pūjanakramoditaniyatāniyatadevatācakrāvalambanena sphurati /
GSP30vatnsupu:162: iha punaḥ pūjyapūjakapūjanasaṃbandhaparihāreṇa śrīmadvātūlanāthādisiddhapravaravaktrāmnāyadṛśā satatasiddhamahāmarīcivikāsaiva sarvottīrṇasvarūpāvibhinnaḥ sarvadaiva
GSP30vatnsupu:165: "*mahāvismayaḥ*" ca vigato vinaṣṭaḥ smayo mitāmitāhaṅkāradarpaḥ sarvollaṅghanavṛttyā svarūpānupraveśaḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:166: atha ca mahāvismayaḥ svaparabhedavismaraṇāj jhaṭiti nirantaranirargalakhecaravṛttisamāveśaḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:170: trayodaśakathākathanasāmarasyātmakaḥ khasvaras tasya bhāvaḥ sāmarasyaprathanaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:171: khasvaras tu kham api bhāvaśūnyam api svena rāti vyāpnoti svīkarotīty ādatte, iti khasvaraḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:172: ṣaḍdarśanacāturāmnāyikasarvamelāpakathātrayodaśakathāsākṣātkāropadeśabhaṅgyānuttarapadādvayatayā kasyacidavadhūtasya pīṭheśvarībhir mahāmelāpasamaye sūtropanibaddho vaktrāmnāyaḥ prakāśitaḥ tasyaiveha manāk satām avabodhārtham asmābhir vṛttir iyaṃ kṛteti śivaṃ /
GSP30vatnsupu:175: kṛtam anupamam uccair kena cic cidvikāsāt /
